direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle Arg objects with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods retrieve Arg objects based on a key, but getArgs returns an array of Args.
Both methods retrieve objects (Arg and Var) based on a key, with similar control flows.
Both methods access properties of objects, though getIndexedProperty accesses indexed properties.
Both methods involve state changes related to validation, though validate is more comprehensive.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require URL parser initialization.
Environment setup is required before validating URLs.
Both methods verify URL formats and handle similar exceptions.
